item.title: The Sheeple Cucktail
item.description: Note: this recipe is satire. Always consult with your doctor or some guy on Facebook before taking any medicine. Unless you are a centaur, or a minotaur, or some other taur. COVID’s answer to the Gin and Tonic The origin of the Gin and Tonic as a way to take bitter antimalarial quinine is well known 1 2. But what are you going to do this century to say healthy and own the libs at the same time?
